titles.title: Homeland Security for Children Act
Homeland Security for Children Act
A bill to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to ensure that the needs of children are considered in homeland security, trafficking, and disaster recovery planning, and for other purposes.
Homeland Security for Children Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

calendar.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
